meanings.definition: To offer or suggest a plan or idea for consideration.
meanings.sent1: She propositioned her friends to go on a picnic this weekend.
meanings.sent2: He is always propositioning new business strategies to the team.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel propositioned the birds to join in a nut-gathering mission.
meanings.sent4: The teacher propositioned a fun way to learn math through games.
meanings.sent5: The magician propositioned an exciting trick to entertain the audience.

meanings.definition: To make a proposal or suggestion, especially of a sexual nature.
meanings.sent1: He was propositioning her for a date at the movies.
meanings.sent2: She felt uncomfortable when he started propositioning her at the party.
meanings.sent3: The cat propositioned the dog to share the sunny spot by the window.
meanings.sent4: The salesman propositioned a tempting offer to the customer.
meanings.sent5: The actor propositioned a romantic scene in the play to his co-star.
